name: Iron Longsword
description: A reliable blade for battling monsters in dark corridors.

name: Crossbow of Precision
description: A ranged weapon designed for quick, accurate shots in tight dungeon spaces.

name: Mage's Staff
description: A staff imbued with elemental magic for powerful spellcasting.

name: Leather Armor
description: Light and flexible armor, offering basic protection.

name: Healing Potion
description: Restores a small amount of health instantly.

name: Crossbow
description: A ranged weapon capable of firing bolts at distant enemies.

name: Fire Arrows
description: Arrows tipped with fire to deal extra damage to enemies.

name: Iron Helmet
description: An iron helmet that offers solid protection for the head.

name: Enchanted Cloak
description: A cloak that enhances the wearer's magical abilities.

name: Poison Dagger
description: A small, sharp dagger laced with poison for lethal strikes.

name: Silver Ring
description: A ring enchanted to boost the wearer's stamina.

name: Thunder Axe
description: A mighty axe that crackles with the power of lightning.
